titleStmt.title: Seven questions of the sabbath briefly disputed, after the manner of the schooles Wherein such cases, and scruples, as are incident to this subject, are cleared, and resolved, by Gilbert Ironside B.D.
titleStmt.author: Ironside, Gilbert, 1588-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield printer to the famous Vniversity, and are to be sold by Edward Forrest,
